import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import AdminDashboard from'./dashboards/AdminDashboard';import OwnerDashboard from'./dashboards/OwnerDashboard';import DoctorDashboard from'./dashboards/DoctorDashboard';import LabTechDashboard from'./dashboards/LabTechDashboard';import RadiologistDashboard from'./dashboards/RadiologistDashboard';import Sidebar from'../components/layout/Sidebar';import Header from'../components/layout/Header';import LoginPage from'./LoginPage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DashboardApp=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);// Check for stored user on component mount
useEffect(()=>{const storedUser=localStorage.getItem('demo_user');if(storedUser){setUser(JSON.parse(storedUser));}},[]);const handleLogin=userData=>{setUser(userData);localStorage.setItem('demo_user',JSON.stringify(userData));};const handleLogout=()=>{setUser(null);localStorage.removeItem('demo_user');};const renderDashboard=()=>{switch(user.role){case'admin':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminDashboard,{});case'owner':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OwnerDashboard,{});case'doctor':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DoctorDashboard,{});case'lab':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LabTechDashboard,{});case'radiologist':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RadiologistDashboard,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4",children:"Dashboard Not Available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:["No dashboard configured for role: ",user.role]})]})});}};if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginPage,{onLogin:handleLogin});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex h-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{user:user}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex-1 flex flex-col overflow-hidden",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{user:user,onLogout:handleLogout}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"flex-1 overflow-y-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-6",children:renderDashboard()})})]})]})});};export default DashboardApp;
